page.title: 17FRIMLEY VILLAGE
page.content: The village of Frimley has developed over the years and is now part of a {sprawling connurbation}which spreads from Camberley to Farnham and across to Fleet. Originally it was used by the{army}and they maintain their presence with a{cadet}training centre on the western edge of the village. The{village centre}consists mainly of shops selling food,drink, and hardware goods and has only one small supermarket.{Buses}connect with most local centres, and the{railway}has a half hourly service to those which are more distant, as well as an hourly service to{London.}The{M3}motorway can be reached at the nearby junction 4 and this allows access to{London in 35 {minutes.}As a consequence most local people do only day to day shopping in the village prefering to go elsewhere for larger items and quantities.
